content.value: AgentCall is a Claude Code MCP plugin that enables voice calls via phone, built with the agentplexus stack (omnivoice, omnivoice-twilio, mcpruntime). Start a task, walk away. Your phone rings when Claude is done, stuck, or needs a decision.

items: **omnivoice** - Voice abstraction layer (TTS, STT, Transport, CallSystem interfaces)
**mcpruntime** - MCP server runtime with built-in ngrok integration
**assistantkit** - Multi-tool plugin configuration management (Claude, Kiro, Gemini)

content.value: AgentCall supports multiple AI coding assistants through the assistantkit bundle API:

items: **Claude Code** - Plugin manifest, skills, commands, hooks
**AWS Kiro CLI** - Agent definitions, MCP server configuration
